attributes.action: Limit anyone working for the BBC to 3 times the average wage whatever their role
attributes.additional_details: The BBC has become a vile financially self serving political institution calling itself Aunty but really being your dirty old uncle in a wig. It can't be left to BBC management to regulate itself and decide how much it thinks it is worth. It must be forced to work within a given budget, shared among every applicable household plus 10 per cent to cover non payers and any money made through selling on content or merchandise to be spread between the licence fee holders at years end.
attributes.background: We want any staff, management or presenters at the BBC to be limited to 3 times the national average wage. To operate within a budget averaged from other mainstream broadcasters pre profit. Over 65 / under 18 given free licence. Managers+ to have public annual audit on performance and impartiality.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This is an operational matter for the BBC.  You can find out how to contact them here:

https://www.bbc.co.uk/contact/
